tools.name: add_document
tools.description: Adds a new document to the project memory. Use this to save session summaries, tasks, or important notes.

content.description: The content of the document to add.

language.description: The programming language of the document (e.g., 'python', 'c++', 'markdown'). Defaults to 'text'.

metadata.description: Optional metadata for the document, e.g., {'task': 'fix bug'}

tools.name: query_documents
tools.description: Intelligently queries the project memory using a hybrid search and reranking for the most relevant documents. Use this to retrieve project context, past summaries, or related tasks.

query.description: The query string to search the documents with.
